item.description:

Auxy is the first thing I’ve had any luck with.

item.source: [POLL] how long have you been making music?

item.title: [POLL] how long have you been making music?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Technically, the first time i made music was in like middle school (about 6-7 years ago), but that was mainly just throwing loops together in Garageband with no real purpose. Dropped it after a while. But it wasnt until sophomore year of High S. that i really started doing music as a hobby n stuff.
I saw the new garageband update. it was a huge one, and really one that made garageband a real DAW that was pretty powerful.

Anyway, in terms of Auxy, i actually recently had my one year “anniversary” (i guess) of using the app. I got it on Christmas day of 2016 & been using it since (obviously)

Read full topic

item.title: [POLL] how long have you been making music?
item.dc:creator: Reaper2.0
item.description:
This poll is how long you’ve been making music.
Not necessarily how long you’ve used Auxy.
That subject already has a topic which can be found here.

How long have you been using Auxy? Random
Well, I’ve been using Auxy for like 7 months and I’m still not the best at it. But I’ve improve a hell of a lot since I started
